topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521960163687244d7120500#post_5521960163687244d7120500
You know what I would truly want to see?

A monster capture game crossed with a tactics game where the monsters are sapient and that humans and the monsters can reproduce and have varying degrees of offspring.

So like you could have a super muscular dragon monster guy or a 100% dragon main character or 100% human character and each individual character has varying degrees of monster or human in them.

... Also a relationship aspect to them and every enemy is recruitable.  Obviously you couldn't have a random character have a relationship with main characters due to having all that dialogue for every random character is impossible but you still be able to hook up your minions together.

Tl:dr; make a "angryjoe vs nintendo" thread instead.
